str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From epi and keimai; to rest upon.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From stauros; to impale on the cross; figuratively, to extinguish passion or selfishness.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To prevail against, overpower, get the upper hand. From kata and ischuo; to overpower.
